net.proteusframework.core.geo

Class ULocaleCountryInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.geo.CountryInformation
      • net.proteusframework.core.geo.ULocaleCountryInformation

  • final class ULocaleCountryInformation
extends CountryInformation
    Country information implementation based on ULocale. This implementation accepts digram and trigram codes. Numeric codes are not supported.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • findISO2CountryCodeByPostalCode

        public String findISO2CountryCodeByPostalCode(String postalCode,
                                              String defaultISOCountryCode)
        Description copied from class: CountryInformation
        Get the first matching ISO country code for the specified postal code.
        Specified by:
        findISO2CountryCodeByPostalCode in class CountryInformation
        Parameters:
        postalCode - the postal code.
        defaultISOCountryCode - a default country code to return if a match isn't found. May be null.
        Returns:
        the first matching ISO country code (digram) that matches the specified postal code.

      • getCountryCallingCodeByISOCountryCode

        public String getCountryCallingCodeByISOCountryCode(String isoCode)
        Description copied from class: CountryInformation
        Get the country calling code for a country by the ISO code.

        This will always return null if CountryInformation.supportsCountryCallingCode() returns false

        Specified by:
        getCountryCallingCodeByISOCountryCode in class CountryInformation
        Parameters:
        isoCode - the ISO country code. If null returns null.
        Returns:
        the calling code without the "+" prefix or null if one wasn't found.

      • getCountryNameByISOCountryCode

        public String getCountryNameByISOCountryCode(String isoLanguage,
                                             String isoCountry)
        Description copied from class: CountryInformation
        Return the country name if found in the specified language. If the country name isn't localized in that language, then an implementation default localization is returned. If the country name is not found, the code is returned.
        Specified by:
        getCountryNameByISOCountryCode in class CountryInformation
        Parameters:
        isoLanguage - the language.
        isoCountry - the country code. If null, null is returned.
        Returns:
        the country name or code.

      • getISO2CountryCode

        public String getISO2CountryCode(String isoLanguage,
                                 String country)
        Description copied from class: CountryInformation
        Return the ISO Country Code digram for the specified country. This method will resolve the specified country into an ISO country code. Example:

        getISOCountryCode(null, "US") => US
        getISOCountryCode(null, "USA") => US
        getISOCountryCode(null, "United States") => US
        getISOCountryCode("en", "Estados Unidos") => null
        getISOCountryCode("es", "Estados Unidos") => US
        getISOCountryCode(null, "Estados Unidos") => US

        Specified by:
        getISO2CountryCode in class CountryInformation
        Parameters:
        isoLanguage - optional language. If not specified, performance may suffer.
        country - the country.
        Returns:
        the ISO country code or null if not found.

      • getISO2CountryCodeList

        public List<String> getISO2CountryCodeList()
        Description copied from class: CountryInformation
        Get a list of ISO country codes (digram).
        Specified by:
        getISO2CountryCodeList in class CountryInformation
        Returns:
        a mutable list.

        Specified by:

      • hasNANP

        public boolean hasNANP(String isoCountryCode)
        Description copied from class: CountryInformation
        Test if the specified ISO country code uses the North American Numbering Plan.

        This will always return false if CountryInformation.supportsCountryCallingCode() returns false

        Specified by:
        hasNANP in class CountryInformation
        Parameters:
        isoCountryCode - the country code. If null, false is returned.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • supportsCountryCallingCode

        public boolean supportsCountryCallingCode()
        Description copied from class: CountryInformation
        Test if this implementation supports returning country dialing codes.
        Specified by:
        supportsCountryCallingCode in class CountryInformation
        Returns:
        true or false.
